about_the_game: Forgive Me Father 2 continues the tradition set by its predecessor, pulling off the uncanny combination of Lovecraftian madness and adrenaline-pumping metal soundtrack. However, pure metal would be boring. Fortunately, the soundtrack was once again composed by the talented Tim Fialka, who knew this, and properly spiced it up. We do hope you enjoy the style, and will not easily succumb to the insanity spread by all the Lovecraftian monstrosities that you will encounter in the game.
